attributes.action: Harry Gregg, Goalkeeper for Manchester United and National Hero
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.harrygregg.com/

Since its formation in 2008, Coleraine FC Academy’s community charity, which has been renamed the Harry Gregg Foundation, has facilitated a wide range of activities for thousands of people each week within our local community, through participation in football, and various other health, lifestyle, educational, heritage and social inclusion activities.

It is our aim to ensure that we cater for all sections of our community; thus promoting positive lifestyle changes, and providing every opportunity to fulfil dreams.
attributes.background: Gregg  'I Was There' on the National Geographic Channel. In particular it centres around a personal journey for a reunion with Vera Lukić, a Serbian woman (the wife of a Yugoslav diplomat), whom Gregg saved from the wreckage, as well as Vera's daughter Vesna, at the time a baby.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions that call clearly for a specific action from the UK Government and Parliament.
